title: bann???really???
body: you gave me 5 20 min banns for not my problem,you wrote on game status that ive been disconnected from pvp due your server problem,i couldnt play,i try to reconnect 3 times and in game i couldnt move my champ,so u revard ME with bann,why is that??is that ok???bann for not my fault!!!!

replies.body: and now misteriously its everything ok after i contact you,tnx,but still not cool to give me bann for nothing done you know ;))

i know that is not just one game,it was a lot of games and i wrote to riot also,but everything u gave me is bann,really not fair,i think no one doesnt even check what problems are,and every time on game status u wrote that problem is in your server,so....its not ok that i got bann for ur mistake sorry

You may receive a disconnection error when your connection to our server breaks.  This is commonly due to an unstable or weak connection with your network failing to communicate with the game.  Accounts can be marked by [leaverbuster ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)and receive a lower priority queue after multiple leaves, and not just a single game.  I recommend going over our [connection issues ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)guide to troubleshoot your network and get back in the game.  Let me know if you have any questions!
